hero.title: NICOLÁS GARCÍA

cases.title: RESEARCH CASES
cases.subtitle: Analysis of optimized digital processes. Each case represents recovered hours and maximized efficiency.

case1.title: Enterprise REST API
case1.description: Development of secure API with Spring Boot, implementing JWT, Swagger documentation and MySQL query optimization.

case2.title: Comprehensive poultry system
case2.description: Complete automation of inventories and forms with Django backend, Flutter mobile and MySQL optimizations.

case3.title: Azure DevOps Pipeline
case3.description: Complete deployment automation with Jenkins, Docker, and Azure DevOps for Spring Boot applications.

profile.title: THE HUMAN BEHIND THE CODE
profile.subtitle: Like many, I value work-life balance, using technology to optimize time and create authentic connections.

location.title: Location
location.description: Based in Pasto, Nariño, Colombia. Open to remote work and hybrid opportunities.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: 2+ years of practical experience in backend development with Spring Boot, Django, and database optimization.

methods.title: Methodologies
methods.description: Specialized in Scrum, agile methodologies, SOLID and KISS principles. Experience leading small teams and implementing best practices.

projects.title: Real Projects
projects.description: Web development for educational institutions, process optimization for poultry company with Django/MySQL/Flutter stack.

formation.title: Training and experience
formation.content: Software Engineering student at Universidad Cooperativa de Colombia with 2 years of practical experience. I've been a university teaching assistant, guiding students in technical concepts and collaborating on institutional projects.

methodologies.title: Methodologies and leadership
methodologies.content: Specialized in Scrum and agile methodologies, SOLID and KISS principles, with experience leading small teams in implementing best practices. Focus on comprehensive technical documentation and basic mentoring.

personal.title: The Human Being
personal.intro: Hi! I'm Nicolás Alejandro García Pasmiño. Throughout my life I've been called many names, so feel free to choose whichever you prefer.
personal.hobbies: When I'm not immersed in code, you'll find me sharing coffee (I'm a fanatic!), training with friends, or seeking good conversations.

music.title: Music Lover
music.description: From salsa and Spanish rock to pop, rap, and various genres in several languages. Sometimes I dare to play the drums.

sports.title: Gym & Sports
sports.description: 2 years of gym discipline. Muay Thai is my favorite escape in my free time.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.description: I like traveling, discovering cultures, meditating, and connecting with nature.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.quote: I don't work more hours, I work smarter. Every line of code is one more hour to live.

empathy.title: Empathy & Collaboration
empathy.description: Authentic connections with colleagues, technical mentoring, and effective teamwork.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Continuous learning, open mind, and ability to pivot according to project needs.

balance.title: Balance & Resilience
balance.description: Work-life separation, resilience through sports and meditation.

human.title: The human being
human.intro: Hi! I'm Nicolás Alejandro García Pasmiño. Throughout my life I've been called many names, so feel free to choose whichever you prefer. My hunger for knowledge didn't start at university, but much earlier, with a robotics course at age 8, fueled by an insatiable curiosity for technology, physics, and video games.
human.personal: When I'm not immersed in the world of code, you'll probably find me sharing a good coffee (I'm a fanatic!), training with friends, or simply seeking a good conversation. I believe the best ideas and connections are born from those authentic moments.

music.title: Music lover
music.description: I enjoy everything from salsa and Spanish rock to pop, rap, and a variety of musical genres in several languages. Sometimes I dare to play the drums.

gym.title: Gym and sports
gym.description: 2 years of gym discipline. Muay Thai is my favorite escape in my free time.
